name: AJ Fernandez - Indomina by AJ Fernandez - Robusto
brand: AJ Fernandez, Indomina by AJ Fernandez
additionalNotes: Loosely translated, Indomina by AJ Fernandez is meant to be interpreted as fierce or untamable, and for the record, the blend sure performs that way. This is AJ Fernandez in action, loaded for bear with a nearly-full mix of Nicaraguan tobaccos that smoke with an abundance of classic spice, wood and leather flavors; a Mexican binder adds sweetness. But what really sends this cigar over the top is the Ecuador-grown Habano 2000 wrapper, a Cuban-seed/CT Shade hybrid that puts on finishing touches of lush, earthy flavor.
